mainboard.name: Beacon of Unrest
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

mainboard.name: Ajani Goldmane
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: You gain 2 life.
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
−6: Create a white Avatar creature token. It has "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."

mainboard.name: Vampire of the Dire Moon
mainboard.oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
mainboard.oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

mainboard.name: Vampire's Bite
mainboard.oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

mainboard.name: Mesmeric Fiend
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Mesmeric Fiend enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.
When Mesmeric Fiend leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

mainboard.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

mainboard.name: Mindslaver
mainboard.oracle_text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

mainboard.name: Witch's Mist
mainboard.oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

mainboard.name: Restoration Angel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

mainboard.name: Lightning Greaves
mainboard.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}

mainboard.name: Alseid of Life's Bounty
mainboard.oracle_text:
Lifelink
{1}, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Battlegrace Angel
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Marshal's Anthem
mainboard.oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Marshal's Anthem enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times Marshal's Anthem was kicked.

mainboard.name: Mistmeadow Skulk
mainboard.oracle_text: Lifelink, protection from mana value 3 or greater

mainboard.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate Will-o'-the-Wisp. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

mainboard.name: Malakir Bloodwitch
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying, protection from white
When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

mainboard.name: The Long Reach of Night // Animus of Night's Reach
Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.
−2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.
